title: Katakoi Meteor Shower
synopsis:
Katakoi Meteor Shower. It is a shooting star whose unrequited love will come true if you wish for it. Seira hoped that she would fall in love with Hikaru from the class next door, but she ended up turning into a cat. It looks like Hikaru has also turned into a cat...? What will happen to the two of them in the future?

(Source: San-X Official Site; translated)
